name: Cowboys vs Aliens
description:
Description

Hey Rick MacMorty,
Aliens are infesting citizens in our town, you can't distinguish who is sane or contaminated. You have only one option... kill them all to stop this plague and save the far west.

How to Play

Arrow keys to move, space bar to shoot and S key to switch gun.

Credits

Game crafted with ❤️ by nidup in compo mode for the 41st Ludum Dare
